snippet: Martha Coakley, the state’s attorney general, took action to force the two mortgage finance giants to comply with a state antiforeclosure law.
abstract: Massachusetts Atty Gen Martha Coakley files suit against Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to force the two mortgage finance giants to comply with state antiforeclosure law passed in 2012; is seeking to force Fannie and Freddie to allow homes with mortgages they back to enter buyback programs, which are aimed at reducing debt of homeowner while saving lender cost of foreclosure and eviction.
lead_paragraph: Martha Coakley, the state’s attorney general, took action to force the two mortgage finance giants to comply with a state antiforeclosure law.

headline.main: Massachusetts Sues Fannie and Freddie Over Foreclosure Law
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Sues Fannie and Freddie Over Foreclosure Law

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
keywords.name: organizations
